name: Kickback
overview: Kickback is a 1-player arcade football game for the Atari 400. The player controls a single football player, as they attempt to bounce a ball past two rows of computer opponents guarding their own goal. The player scores points for every football placed in their opponent's goal. If the player hits stationary computer opponents, they are removed from the field. If the player has 4 goals on their own net, it's game over. There are 4 levels of opponent difficulty.
